Shop Single Item

White Moose Head

White Moose Head

by Lora Barnes

The Edmonton- White Faux Moose Head Wall Hanging, the original sculpure by White Faux Taxidermy. Inspired by the natural wildlife surrounding our location in Utah, this faux moose head was created to appreciate nature. Each Edmonton moose is first cast from a limited-run template, then they are hand-painted using a matte white acrylic paint which renders more detail without overwhelming your space.

Material:

Concrete

$ 86.00

$ 106.00

Free Standard Domestic Shipping and free Returns on Orders of $75 or More

Categories:

Pictures


Share:
Measurements:
  • 18.5" tall (47 cm)
  • 24.25" wide (61.6 cm)
  • 8.25" deep (20.95 cm)
Hanging Instructions:
  • Use a monkey hook, strong nail or screw
  • The moose antlers are removable to save space in shipping
  • Glue the antlers in place with super glue before hanging
